attributes.action: Safeguard all savings accounts within the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the current economic downturn, I propose the Government to safeguard all savings. This will stop people withdrawing from banks in trouble and therefore ease the pressure on them. If the government doesn't do this, they will end up having to spend billions on bail out's anyway.

This will give some comfort and stability to the British people, in this time of uncertainty.

Thanks a lot.
